channel.title: Ebay
channel.description:
So im using Ebay for my first time. I'm trying to sell my IPhone 4s. Basically I just made my Ebay account, got everything set up, put the Iphone up for sale. About 15 minutes after I set it up for sale, i received a message from Ebay saying my account is restricted and my listings have been removed. But does not say why, just to contact them, which I can't do until between 5am and 10pm pacific apparently.
Did I do something wrong? Just sort of need some input on whats going on. I've never used Ebay, not familiar with it what so ever.
Thanks in advance ~Moto

item.title: Ebay
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

iphones are high priority items anything like that usually requires some ratings before you try to sell

Read full topic

item.title: Ebay
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

no idea why they did that, just ask them

Read full topic
